scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -rf ../docs && mkdir -p ../docs && cp -R dist/* ../docs/
scripts.deploy:ghpages: npm run build && git worktree add ../.gh-pages gh-pages || true && rm -rf ../.gh-pages/* && cp -R dist/* ../.gh-pages/ && cd ../.gh-pages && git add -A && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' || true && git push origin gh-pages && cd - && git worktree remove ../.gh-pages || true
